sources.title: Stigma (1972)
sources.description: A black doctor ex-convict returns to the all-white town he knows as home and discovers a deadly disease threatening the citizens. He must fight prejudice and time if he is to save the town. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/stigma-1972/

metadata.Plot: A knowledgeable- doctor, Calvin Crosse (Philip Michael Thomas) moves to a secluded community and soon discovers a deadly virus affecting the young town's people. What is more disturbing, is the conspiracy to protect this epidemic when he tries to cure those infected.
metadata.Actors: Philip Michael Thomas, Harlan Cary Poe, Josie Johnson
